On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will discuss the issues animating the national discussion this week as the UN General Assembly is in session and the Syrian refugee and Muslim migration issue is the topic of much debate.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Public Interest Law Professor John Banzhaf of George Washington University Law School will explain why “immigration security” based on profiling is constitutional.
Congressman Brian Babin (R-TX) will discuss his latest effort to put a pause on the refugee resettlement program through an upcoming spending bill.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will break down President Obama’s speech on Tuesday before the UN General Assembly.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
We’ll also hear from veteran pollster Pat Caddell about Donald Trump’s new momentum in the polls.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
